# Problem 1 - Mr. Trash Wheel
```{r}
mr_trash_wheel = read_excel(
  "./Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx",
  sheet="Mr. Trash Wheel",
  range = cell_limits(ul=c(2,NA),lr=c(406,14))
  ) %>% 
   janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate (
    sports_balls = as.integer(round(sports_balls))
  )
```
